assessment_item.title: 7T6PMB-Q23-வேரின் மேற்பரப்பு என்பது அழைக்கப்படுவது_________.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

வேரின் மேற்பரப்பு என்பது அழைக்கப்படுவது_________.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ரைசோஸ்பியர்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1754"},{"text":"

ரைசோபிளான்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1755"},{"text":"

பில்லோபியர்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1765"},{"text":"

ஸ்பெர்மோஸ்பியர்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1770"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7T6PMB-Q23-வேரின் மேற்பரப்பு என்பது அழைக்கப்படுவது_________.","title":"7T6PMB-Q23-வேரின் மேற்பரப்பு என்பது அழைக்கப்படுவது_________.","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
